title: General Specifications
content:
Type .................... 90° V-10 Engine
Bore .................... 101.6 mm (4.00 inch)
Stroke .................... 98.6 mm (3.88 inch)
Compression Ratio .................... 9.6:1
Displacement .................... 8.0 liter (488 Cubic inch)
Brake Horsepower .................... 450 @ 5200 RPM
Torque .................... 490 Lbs. Ft. @ 3700 RPM
Firing Order .................... 1, 10, 9, 4, 3, 6, 5, 8, 7, 2
Lubrication .................... Pressure Feed-Full Flow Filtration (Direct Crankshaft Driven Pump)
Cooling System .................... Liquid Cooled-Forced Circulation
Cylinder Block .................... Aluminum Alloy With Pressed-in Iron Sleeves
Approximate Weight .................... 650 lbs.
Crankshaft .................... Forged Steel
Cylinder Head .................... Aluminum Alloy
Connecting Rods .................... Forged Steel
Piston .................... Forged Aluminum Alloy
Compression Pressure .................... 1069 - 1172 kPa (155 - 170 psi)
Maximum Variation Between Cylinders .................... 25%
